RelatedSentence: The police in Lagos on Monday arraigned a 32 - year - old man , Kelvin Robert , over alleged conspiracy and armed robbery , after six years in police custody .

A0: The police in Lagos on Monday
RelatedSentence: He allegedly committed the offences on March 11 , 2008 at the Tin-Can Island , Apapa , Lagos , at 7.30p.m .

A0: The police in Lagos on Monday
RelatedSentence: The police said that the offences contravened Sections 402 and 406 of the Criminal Law of Lagos State , 2011 .
The police said that the offences contravened Sections 402 and 406 of the Criminal Law of Lagos State , 2011 .
Robert , however , pleaded not guilty to the two - count charge .
His Counsel , Mr C.C. Ekpobosa , expressed dissatisfaction that the accused was being charged to court after six years of arrest .
That is , six years wasted out of his lifetime , he said .
